full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,DPAL DUR KHROD BDAG PO YAB YUM LA GTOR 'BUL BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @006A *, ,(CES DPAL DUR KHROD BDAG PO YAB YUM LA GTOR 'BUL MA JI LTA BU ZHIG DGOS ZHES SMAN PA GRVA TSANG GI GRVA RIGS TSE GTAN GYIS NAN TAN DU BSKUL BA'I NGOR, MKHAN CHEN SPRUL MING GIS SUG BRIS SU BGYIS PA'O, ,'DIS KYANG RGYAL BA'I BSTAN PA YUN RING DU GNAS PA'I RGYUR GYUR CIG , ,,)
